Text: GBN Winter Reception Houstonpst Greetings all I hope each of you had a joyous holiday I simply wanted to remind you about the winter reception in Houston Details are listed below Please call our office at by January th if you plan to attend The Cotton Exchange Franklin Thursday January PM Details Appetizers and cash bar I hope to see you there Special thanks to Glenn Sprenger and Richard Burgess for coordinating this event Cheers Kippi Kippi Griffith Assistant Director of Alumni Relations McCombs School of Business Graduate Business Network ph fx website gbn
